libICEpost.src.thermophysicalModels.thermoModels
================================================

.. py:module:: libICEpost.src.thermophysicalModels.thermoModels

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   @author: F. Ramognino       <federico.ramognino@polimi.it>
   Last update:        24/12/2024

   Package with classes for handling complete thermodynamic modeling of a system.

   Content of the package:
       ThermoModel (class)
           Class for thermodynamic modeling of a system

       ThermoState (class)
           DataClass for thermodynamic state of a system

       ThermoMixture (package)
           Classes for thermodynamic modeling of a mixture

       StateInitializer (package)
           Classes for initialization of a thermodynamic state (used by ThermoModel constructor)

       CombustionModel (package)
           Classes for combustion models

       EgrModel (package)
           Models for computation of EGR mixture and fresh mxiture with EGR

-----------
